page.title: 04CARLISLE POTTERY
page.content: MR SNOWBALL WHO IS THE OWNER OF LINSTOCK POTTERY HAS BEEN MAKING POTTERY FROM 1974 AND IT WAS OPENED TO THE PUBLIC IN 1975.HE MAKES ABOUT 250 THINGS A WEEK.HE MAKES TABLE WARE, MUGS,CERAMIC ANIMALS,TEAPOTS AND VASES.PEOPLE COME FROM ALL OVER THE WORLD TO SEE AND BUY THE POTTERY FOR EXAMPLE CHINA,HONGKONG,AMERICA,FRANCE AND HOLLAND.THE COLOUR OF THE POTTERY IS A LIGHT BROWN TO START OFF WITH. THEN WHEN IT COMES OUT OF THE KILM IT IS A DARK BROWN.THEN YOU LEAVE IT TO COOL BEFORE PAINTING THE OUTSIDE. THEN LET THE PAINT DRY BEFORE PUTTING THE WATERPROOF CENTRE IN.THEN WHEN IT IS DRY PUT THE GLAZING IN.THE BUSIEST WEEK OF ALL IS THE GREAT FAIR WEEK AT THE END OF AUGUST WHERE THEY TAKE THEIR POTTERY AND TRY TO SELL IT. BY G S L GRAHAM & E M CARPENTER.
